DOC.brief_summary: This study propose analyze effect Kinesio TapingÂ® chronic nonspecific low back pain . All subject submit evaluation painful sensation , functional performance , trunk range motion neuromuscular performance three different time .
DOC.brief_title: Kinesio Taping Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Female 18 50 year age chronic nonspecific low back pain three month . Serious spinal pathology ( fracture , tumor , inflammatory pathology ankylose spondylitis ) ; Nerve root compromise ( disc herniation spondylolisthesis neurological compromise , spinal stenosis , others ) ; Fibromyalgia Corticosteroid treatment previous two week ; Antiinflammatory treatment previous 24 hour ; Contraindications use Kinesio Taping ( allergy intolerance ) ; Score two less Visual Analogue Scale first day ; Pregnancy ; Previous Kinesio Tape therapy lumbar .
